MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL42 postcode area of Barmouth, affecting properties in Heol Y Llan and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 11:57PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3AM on 28 April 2021.
